violations.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
violations.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has children which are not allowed: a[tabindex]

violations.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
violations.help: Form elements should have a visible label

nodes.html: <input class="search-main__input" id="search" type="search" name="searchString" title="Søk i nettsted" placeholder="Søk" autocomplete="off" required="">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Only title used to generate label for form element

violations.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
violations.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.36:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0074a2, surrounding text: #585858)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

Fix all of the following:
  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Hopp til innhald
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

violations.help: [role="img"] elements must have an alternative text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensure tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
violations.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

nodes.html: Hopp til innhald
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has a tabindex greater than 0
